text:
Created a nifty chrome extension to solve the problem of "where did they put lists again?" when navigating HubSpot. Here is my post about it on LinkedIn with a video:

<https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7290766433762824195/>

If you don't care about the LI post, here is a link right to the chrome extension: <https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/hs-nav/kgnoogdidhnefkepigajbifecfhajged>

Basically just a custom search bar for quickly navigating around
